pages.text: The $(mob)Vampire$() is a monster that spawns in the Ice Plains of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It attacks players on sight with life-draining melee attacks, which inflict $(thing)Mining Fatigue$() on contact and summoning up to 5 $(l:grimoireofgaia_butler)$(mob)Butlers$() to aid it. A $(mob)Vampire$() heals itself for 10% of their health per hit. It is immune to falling damage, drowning, Fire, and ranged attacks. A $(mob)Vampire$() can move through cobwebs and water unimpeded but is vulnerable to sunlight.
$(mob)Vampires$() drop $(item)Golden Apple Pie Slices$() on death, which can be eaten to grant players the same benefits as gained from eating a $(item)Golden Apple$().
$(mob)Vampires$() rarely drop $(item)The Vampire$(), which is a decorative item similar to a $(item)Minotaur Bust$(), representing the $(mob)Vampire$() creature.
